tool_description: Get the average price of recently sold eBay listings based on keywords and filters as well as individual listing information.
name: eBay Average Selling Price
title: eBay Average Selling Price

api_list.name: Item Detials
api_list.description: Get a ton of data about a specific item using its item_id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-average-selling-price.p.rapidapi.com/itemDetails"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-average-selling-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Find Sold Items
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all completed items found using keywords. It will also return the average price, minimum price, maximum price, the response URL, and information and prices for each individual item.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ebay-average-selling-price.p.rapidapi.com/findCompletedItems"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ebay-average-selling-price.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
